events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses due to a recent surgery.
Loan team has reviewed the submitted application and categorized it under Personal Loan for medical purposes.
A loan officer specialized in personal loans has been assigned to assist the applicant with their request.
Initial review of the personal loan application was completed, checking eligibility and loan amount requested.
The applicant was asked to provide medical bills, proof of income, and identification documents for validation.
Applicant has uploaded all requested medical documentation, income statements, and valid ID to support the application.
Credit bureau performed a standard credit check returning a satisfactory credit score suitable for loan approval.
Risk assessment team evaluated the financial and credit risks associated with lending for this medical personal loan.
A loan offer including interest rates, repayment terms, and amount approved was presented to the applicant.
The applicant responded positively accepting the proposed terms and expressed gratitude for the timely offer.
The loan approval was finalized after internal approvals confirming eligibility and documentation compliance.
Funds were successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account for covering the indicated medical expenses.
Follow-up call was conducted to ensure the applicant understood repayment schedules and offer support if needed.
The personal loan application case was closed successfully after confirming full funding and applicant satisfaction.
